content.text: Advertisement: Introducing the EcoTrek 3000, the ultimate backpack for outdoor enthusiasts! Crafted from 100% recycled materials, this backpack is not only environmentally friendly but also highly durable. With a capacity of 40 liters, it features multiple compartments to keep your gear organized. The ergonomic design ensures comfort during long hikes, while the waterproof coating protects your belongings from unexpected rain. Whether you're exploring the mountains or the city, the EcoTrek 3000 is your perfect companion. Available now at select retailers and online. Don’t miss our special launch offer: 20% off for the first 100 customers!

content.text: Text Message: Alex: Hey, just a reminder that we're meeting at the new Italian place, La Trattoria, for dinner at 7 PM. Do you need a ride? Liz: Thanks, Alex! I’ll get there on my own. I’ve heard the pasta is amazing. Alex: Yeah, I've read great reviews. By the way, could you bring the book I lent you last month? I need it for a project. Liz: Sure, I’ll bring it along. Looking forward to the dinner!

ask.text: What is the main topic of Alex's message?
